class_notes: This class is open to enrolled Emory College students only. You must email the SON Office of Education at nrsgpermissioninquiries@emory.edu for registration approval and support. Pre-requisite lectures will be online synchronous sessions at the time specified. All lab experiences will be online. Asynchronous means students will log in at a time convenient to them to complete the work required for a course or lab session.
course_description: This course focuses on human development from conception to death with an emphasis on the lifespan perspective. Cognitive, psychosocial, behavioral, sociocultural and ecological systems theories are explored as well as the impact of genetic and environmental factors.
sections: Class Nbr: 4077, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: L. Zauche, Status: Open
